website_summaries.verdict: Columbia’s Wayfinder Mid Outdry hiking boot pleases the outdoor community with its good set of features. It is appreciated for its comfiness and support without being weighty. Thanks to its true-to-width fit, breathable interior, and grippy lugged outsole, it has earned positive reviews. However, a reported con draws it away from perfection. By and large, the Wayfinder Mid Outdry from Columbia is a boot that ticks all the basics.
pros: A majority of online buyers comment that the Columbia Wayfinder Mid Outdry is a very comfortable boot
This mid-hiker from Columbia pleases a number of wearers with its lightness
According to a couple of owners, it provides a great deal of support
The waterproof liner of this trail boot proves its effectiveness on wet encounters, based on plenty of consumer reviews
A gear tester also declared that it is able to hold up on long, soaked trails
Some wearers like the well-defined lugs of the Wayfinder Mid Outdry’s outsole
They added that it provides excellent grip
A lot of owners expressed how satisfied they are with the boot’s breathability
It does not ask for a break-in period, as testified by plenty of buyers
They also mentioned that it is comfy out of the box
The glove-like fit of the Wayfinder Mid Outdry impresses a few
An expert love this Columbia offering as it reduces his foot fatigue to a great extent
cons: An online buyer stated that the Wayfinder Mid Outdry from Columbia is too rigid for him

customer_reviews.title: Great soles, thin uppers
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing this hiking boot was climbing the slopes of a very steep volcano. The soles gripped the loose rock and dirt very well and the boots performed well overall. On the minus side I am not sure I like the thinner material on the top side of the boots just yet. The boots probably breathe better through this material but I am used to the thicker, more rugged material on my previous pair of Columbia’s which have lasted for many years. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cooley

customer_reviews.title: NOT WOMEN'S SIZES
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as Women's sizes, but I recieved men's.
customer_reviews.author: mergendahl

customer_reviews.title: Master gripping hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Hiking in the porcupine mountains... these boots did the job! If I could pick only one shoe to go hiking in these would be it!!! Gripping action, I love Columbia!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this ones, comfortable and waterproof. I will say that like any shoe, if you stay too long in the water, water will get to those parts that the shoe is open. It is normal. Great hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Mahonri

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars if not for color
customer_reviews.text: This was such a comfortable boot!!! I thought the mesh area was gray and it's green. Otherwise, a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Men’s sizes
customer_reviews.text: As previously stated in reviews- these are Men’s sizes. Fit well and feel sturdy for the price. Haven’t hiked in them yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Said it was a ladies boot but it’s a men’s boot. Now they want me to pay double the price to exchange it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NY hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! So far they have got me through some medium to difficult trails throughout NY and NJ. They are sturdy, have great ankle support, and been great through thick brush, gravel, and wetlands. Very reasonably priced and have kept my feet super warm. Highly recommend for the east coast or wherever!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Nice Grip
customer_reviews.text: The boot fit great and is nice and lightweight. Took them out for a first hike on a steep rocky trail. They performed very well. My feet did not get hot. The tread gripped very well and there was good support for the ankles. I am pleased with these hiking boots
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Does the job done right keep you dry and warm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job done right!!! I love these boots does the job keeps your feet dry and warm during rain and hiking in the mud and dirt I bought these to keep my feet dry and warm for a rain boot and also for a family camping trip this is a win-win for hiking boots and also as a pair of great rain boots All year round.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Heather Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the boot, nice color and fit/comfort. The high top part hurt my ankle. I exchanged them for Ahnu boots, a big difference with nice ankle cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These hiking shoes fit perfectly with enough room for thicker socks. I like that they don’t look like typical hiking boots and more like sneakers. Haven’t worn them in the rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shoe but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was made well and true to size but the footbed was too firm for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Days

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Women’s, they sent Men’s
customer_reviews.text: It says "Columbia Women's Wayfinder MID Outdry Boot" but the boots received are for men. This was the green pair, size 9. They are too big, so will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: A. Korman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from first wear. Fairly waterproof. And love the look! High quality shoe
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes served me well in mucking and gutting flooded homes! I walked through ankle-deep water and my feet kept dry!! Amazing! My feet were comfortable despite long working days and the ankle support was a nice touch. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Great show! Well made. Can't wait to hit the trails in them, especially to show off the colors. Definitely recommend this boot!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: True to size! Comfy, colorful, waterproof. Shoes have great traction and support on the trails, and I will wear them in the city when it’s raining!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Wayfinder Mid Outdry Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Great for trail running or hiking on all types of terrain, This multi-sport shoe features a durable mesh upper with protective toe and heel caps for extra coverage. And thanks to waterproof OutDry tech, it's ready for any stream or puddle in your path.
feature_bullets: Durable closed mesh upper with synthetic overlays and synthetic screen print toe cap and heel for extra protection
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
